isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: BENDIX TU-FLO 550 AND TU-FLO 750 - ASSEMBLE - FINAL COMPRESSOR ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: FINAL COMPRESSOR ASSEMBLY
svcproc.para: Install all crankshaft keys making certain to support the crankshaft to avoid bearing damage. Install the crankshaft nut where applicable. When installing drive couplings or gears, do not exceed 120 foot pounds (162.696 N•m) torque on the crankshaft nut. Use covers, plugs, or masking tape to protect all ports if compressor is not to be installed immediately. Protect the ends of the crankshaft against damage by wrapping with masking tape or friction tape.
